summary: TensorFlow implementation of the RoFormer transformer model adapted for token classification tasks, offering a ready‑to‑use architecture that maps input token sequences to per‑token label predictions.
business_intent: Enable developers to apply a pretrained RoFormer model for sequence labeling applications such as named entity recognition, part‑of‑speech tagging, or any token‑level NLP task, simplifying fine‑tuning and inference within TensorFlow pipelines.
